title: Particle Physics additional DI funds
impactText: The discovery of the Higgs Boson captured the imagination of millions of people. It will lead to an increased interest in science among the general public and lead to more students studying science at University. Education Societal
findingsText: We have discovered the Higgs Boson the fundamental scalar boson that is predicted to give mass to all other particles. Further research is required to establish if this is the Higgs Boson or if it is one of many (possibly Supersymmetric) Higgs Bosons. Education
